short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scrape social media profile data. Currently supports X (formally Twitter).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- A Chrome Extension to scrape social media profile data. Currently supports X (formally Twitter).
  🎉 Social Scraper - Scraper for X, automatically extracts public profile data like email, bio, location, etc. from X and exports them to csv files, helping you to expand your business leads.  
- 💡 Features
  ✓ Scrape profile data of any user from X.  
  ✓ Export data to CSV files.  
- 🔒 Data Privacy
  All data is processed in your local computer, it never passes through our web server and no one knows what you have saved.  
- ⚠️ Statement
  X is a trademark of X Corp. Social Scraper is not affiliated with, endorsed by, sponsored by or otherwise related to X Corp. or any of its affiliates or subsidiaries.  
  There is a risk that your account will be deactivated or blocked by X when using the extension, and you should control the frequency of use at your own risk.  
- 👋 Contact
  If you have any issues, feel free to contact support@100xtools.com
